catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 446.21; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 278.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: swimmer with long hair, holding a knife in PR hand, entangled in an octopus' tentacles; thin paper mounted on backing sheet
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink on paper
portfolio: From untitled series known as Sketches by Yoshitoshi (Yoshitoshi ryakuga 芳年略画)
title: The Diving Woman of Shido Bay
